description: The procurement arrangement is between Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development department, and the supplier for the purchase and delivery of goods for the Milan project. The contractor has to provide quotations to obtain this agreement. An individual can submit a partial application in addition to other relevant information in a tender box. As part of the tendering process the contractor would have to complete 10 hours of orientation preparation that will have to go through their HR department. The procurement notification was found in Section II.  Notice Inviting Pre-Quotation and Tender Documentation Guideline V. 4.8 Mandatory Tendering Authorization. The successful bidder will be selected using multiple valuation methods. Bidders be should also fairly and transparently awarded. \\Description: This NPP is issued under the PWGSC Supply Arrangement procedure #E60HN-16ELEC \\and the General Stream The department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) has a requirement for the purchase and delivery of goods for the Milan project This procurement arrangement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement And an appraisal was done using multiple valuation methods where the successful bidder was awarded using - the following - a transparent and fair method.
